name: Apollo 11: A Journey through Space
description:
Navigate through the dangers of Space as the famous Apollo 11 rocket! Use your skills to move the spaceship and avoid incoming barrages of asteroids and UFOs! Survive the longest time possible and break your records!

Instructions: On the start screen, select the second gamemode (the second rocket button) and press play! 

Movement: Use tap/click to move up and double tap/click to move down.
